channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report E-2024100605
item.description:
Report E-2024100605

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-24
  • City: BIG ISLAND
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG SPECIALTY PRODUCTS GROUP, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 17500
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: A valve on the trailer was corroded and allowed approximately 900 gallons of product to be released. A small portion of the spilled product was able to migrate to a nearby storm drain. First Call Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
